St._Cloud.KCFB:
KCFB is a Christian radio station licensed to Saint Cloud, Minnesota, broadcasting on 91.5 MHz FM. The station is owned by Minnesota Christian Broadcasters, Inc.
KCFB's programming includes Christian talk and teaching shows such as Truth for Life with Alistair Begg, The Cal Thomas Commentary, Focus on the Family, Turning Point with David Jeremiah, Back to the Bible with Woodrow Kroll, Insight For Living with Chuck Swindoll, Revive Our Hearts with Nancy Leigh DeMoss, In Touch with Charles Stanley, and In the Market with Janet Parshall. KTIG also airs a variety of Christian music.
